translations: [计]编码（encode 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Protein synthesis begins when the gene encoding a protein is activated.
sentences.translation: 当编码蛋白质的基因被激活时，蛋白质合成就开始了。

sentences.sentence: Encoding,  is a special way of paying attention to an event that has a major impact on recalling it later.
sentences.translation: 编码是一种特殊的方式，能让你把注意力集中到一件事上，对你以后回想起它有很大影响。

sentences.sentence: Encoding, Schacter explains, is a special way of paying attention to an event that has a major impact on recalling it later.
sentences.translation: 沙克特解释说：“编码是一种特殊的方式，它能让你把注意力集中到一件事上，而这件事对你以后回忆起它有很大的影响。”
